title: While patching, around 20% my league client starts loading incredibly slowly
body: While patching, around 20% my league client starts loading incredibly slowly this then causes my pc to freeze and crash and my league client doesnt finish patching even after 8 hours

replies.body: Did the ticket help as i seem to be having a similar if not the same issue

It sounds like your pc is having problems while the client is reading from the game files. This could be due to some kind of firewall setting slowing down the scanning process. Reach out to our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to guide you through a few steps that should get you back on the Rift!
